name: Super Air Football | Soccer Free
description:
The most addictive Air Football game arrives! Super Air Football Free is the free version of Super Air Football | Soccer Pro. This title is a new fully featured AI and multiplayer driven Air Football title. Tap and swipe your way to victory!

Play one of five different computer AI difficulty levels or compete with your friends live in multiplayer mode. With sounds, music, different backgrounds, it's an overall great app that will satisfy your Air Football needs.

• How To Play:
Simply touch your football player to grab it and go! Remember to keep your paddle about a foot from the goal on defense. Hold still to block the straight shots, and pull back to the corners to block the bank shots!

• Modes:
Single Player Mode.
There are five levels of difficulty to this mode, these are:
a. Casual
b. Easy
c. Medium
d. Hard
e. Extreme

Two Player Modes.
Battle on the same iPhone or iPod Touch with your friends.

• Controls:
The player can move the paddle by moving the finger on iPhone left, right, backward, and forward.

• Scoring:
The player must score at least 7 points to win a the game, The amount of points to win can be changed in the options.

• Resume Play:
If you leave the app, your game status will be saved and you can resume later.

• Options:
You have the ability to change:
-If sound/music is on or not
-The volume of the sound
-The max score to win
-The background image
